jodd.json

Interface TypeJsonSerializer<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArraysJsonSerializer, BooleanArrayJsonSerializer, BooleanJsonSerializer, ByteArrayJsonSerializer, CalendarJsonSerializer, CharacterJsonSerializer, CharSequenceJsonSerializer, ClassJsonSerializer, DateJsonSerializer, DoubleArrayJsonSerializer, EnumJsonSerializer, FileJsonSerializer, FloatArrayJsonSerializer, IntArrayJsonSerializer, IterableJsonSerializer, JDateTimeSerializer, KeyValueJsonSerializer, LongArrayJsonSerializer, MapJsonSerializer, NumberJsonSerializer, ObjectJsonSerializer, ValueJsonSerializer

    public interface TypeJsonSerializer<T>
    Type JSON Serializer defines how a type is serialized into JSON string.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean serialize(JsonContext jsonContext, T value)
      Serializes a value and writes a JSON content.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        boolean serialize(JsonContext jsonContext,
                  T value)
        Serializes a value and writes a JSON content. Returns true if content was written. Returns false if content for some reason was not written.
